basics.name: Michael Herman
basics.label: Engineer. Entrepreneur. Educator.
basics.summary: Experienced software developer, specialized in building full-stack web applications, developing RESTful APIs, delivering automated testing solutions, and architecting cloud-based infrastructure solutions with Docker and container orchestration tools.

work.summary: For companies in regulated industries using AI to make decisions, Monitaur provides an assurance software platform to manage governance and unlock innovation.
highlights: Architected and developed core software platform
Hired and managed four engineers
Customer discovery

work.summary: TestDriven.io teaches intermediate to advanced-level developers how to build, test, and deploy microservices using a number of popular tools and technologies like Docker, Python, Flask, React, and AWS.
highlights: Used Django, Vue, and Docker to develop a learning management system.
Developed and maintained the core training materials.
Ran all aspects of the business.

work.summary: Eldarion develops web applications and provides products and services built around the Pinax platform.
highlights: Used Django, Flask, Vue, React, and Docker to architect solutions to client problems.
Set up a Continuous Integration and Delivery pipeline with GitLab and Docker Swarm.
Developed an ETL pipeline.

work.summary: ClickFox provides a customer journey analytics platform that connects customer touch point data across enterprise systems to create transparent, end-to-end customer journeys.
highlights: Architected, designed, and developed a big-data analytics platform using Python, Flask, Docker, Redis, and Spark.
Maintained and enhanced their automated build and test infrastructure.
Developed a solution for delivering applications to an offline environment with Docker.

work.summary: Crowd-funded through Kickstarter, the Real Python courses provide Python programming and full-stack web development training through hands-on, interesting examples that are both useful and fun.
highlights: Managed all three Real Python course Kickstarter campaigns.
Authored the second course which focuses on full-stack web development with Python and JavaScript.
Ran all aspects of the company until it was sold.

work.summary: Thinkful is an online, experiential, project-based coding school that leverages one-on-one mentorship to prepare students for careers in full-stack web development and data science.
highlights: Assisted students on a one-on-one basis in the Python, Ruby, Angular, React, and Node courses.
Provided guidance and support to students based on their unique individual needs.
Developed and hosted workshops in the web development course track.

work.summary: Galvanize is part coding bootcamp and part community workspace. By aligning education and industry under one roof in each of its urban campuses, Galvanize puts learning and working side-by-side to create a unique experience for both students and entrepreneurs to level-up their skills and abilities.
highlights: Introduced and integrated an end-to-end testing framework.
Developed a continuous integration and delivery pipeline with GitHub, Docker, and AWS EC2.
Architected and implemented on-demand test environments via AWS Elastic Container Service.
Successfully wrote and maintained content, code exercises, and automated test suites related to the technologies taught in the immersive programs.
Developed and led the first blended, part-time web development course.
Produced standards and assessments for outcomes-based curriculum.
Planned and delivered lectures, in-class projects, and other class activities.
Coached and mentored instructors to utilize advanced teaching techniques in support of student success.
Developed internal software tools to facilitate a dynamic and collaborative classroom community.

work.summary: Served a diverse clientele as a software developer, trainer, architect, and consultant to develop, improve, and manage custom solutions for small to medium sized businesses.
highlights: Provided specialty service in building and testing full-stack web applications using modern languages, delivering user training, and collaborating with in-house teams and start-ups on open source projects.
Developed technical requirements, coding standards, and documentation.

work.summary: Infoteria Corporation is an enterprise software company that specializes in providing software and related support, consulting, and training.
highlights: Served as the lead for company acquisition (worth more than $1MM) by partnering with executives on valuation analysis and discovery of competitive advantage opportunities.
Led the operations team which was responsible for all aspects of financial planning, budgeting, forecasting and reporting.
